sceneDescription.title: Jim Overhears the Conspiracy in the Apple Barrel

setting.location: Below deck, the Hispaniola at sea

characters.action: Crouched down, hand over mouth to stifle breathing

scene.mainElements: Dark ship's hold with boy accidentally trapped in barrel overhearing mutinous plot, conspirators unaware of witness
scene.details: Large wooden apple barrel with boy barely visible through gap in lid, swinging lantern casting moving shadows, coiled ropes and supply crates creating maze-like space, rats scurrying in corners, creaking ship timbers, glimpse of boy's terrified eye through barrel gap
scene.background: Deep shadows of ship's hold, stairs leading to upper deck
scene.atmosphere: Claustrophobic terror, betrayal revealed, danger of discovery, pivotal moment of lost innocence

composition.cameraAngle: Low angle showing barrel interior and conspirators beyond
composition.focus: Boy's frightened eye visible through barrel gap
composition.depth: Extreme close-up of eye in foreground, conspirators in lantern light middle ground, dark hold receding to background
